thread.title: Cut down to size: readers' photos on the theme of small
thread.title_full: Cut down to size: readers' photos on the theme of small

author: Guardian readers and Tom Stevens
title: Cut down to size: readers' photos on the theme of small
text: Small people …big city Photograph: Evan Jones/GuardianWitness Standing on the edge Hard to believe, but this was taken in central Edinburgh. I climbed Arthurs Seat to watch the sunset and, whilst up there, the sea mist suddenly rolled in and enveloped these ghostly figures in the distance Photograph: Peter Moore/GuardianWitness Sweet Peony Photograph: Vladislav Tumir/GuardianWitness Fragments from the beach I collect seaglass, most of the pieces I find are smaller that a penny and these usually get stored in jars rather than made into jewellery like the larger pieces. Don’t have a picture of the jar, but I do have this shot of this little haul from my hometown beach this weekend Photograph: emilyjupitus/GuardianWitness Small change In for a pennyPhotograph: Jon Neil/GuardianWitness It’s a hard life Paws of my miniature Daschund, as he has his 17th nap of the day Photograph: Ashlea Norton/GuardianWitness Stratospheric Silhouette Flying demands a rapid recalibration of our spatial senses, as takeoff flattens all infrastructure against the curvature of the earth. Within a plane we still enjoy familiar reference points to safeguard our insignificance, but catching a quick glimpse of our tiny silhouette atop cloud cover quickly reminded me how fragile that illusion is Photograph: Matt Withers/GuardianWitness Small Car “Fiat Punto” toy car on mossy tarmac Photograph: AlexFlynn/GuardianWitness Small sparrows in a large concrete world Sparrow chicks on a wire in Cluj-Napoca, Romania Photograph: iftene/GuardianWitness Tiny man, big egg Just playing around with some railway figures Photograph: nicpiper/GuardianWitness Hermit crab Tiny things seem to fascinate children the most. Here is a hermit crab held by my child aged just threePhotograph: sugarbutty/GuardianWitness A Tiny Creature and its egg Photograph: sara athari/GuardianWitness Small giant Celebrating the not-so-little chinchilla giganta at a small livestock show at Alexandra Palace in London in the 1970s Photograph: RichardDerwent/GuardianWitness
